description: This file contains utility functions for console output and logging, including style definitions, print functions, and user interaction prompts, used within a larger Python project.

methods.name: print_heading
methods.description: Prints a heading message with a specific style.

methods.name: print_subheading
methods.description: Prints a subheading message with a specific style.

methods.name: log_config_not_available_msg
methods.description: Logs an error indicating the configuration is missing.

methods.name: log_active_workspace_not_available
methods.description: Logs errors related to missing active workspace.

methods.name: print_available_workspaces
methods.description: Displays a list of available workspaces.

methods.name: confirm_yes_no
methods.description: Prompts the user for a yes/no confirmation.
